items.name: Laravel Modules
items.description: This is a very useful package to make the large applications scalable. Once used, I found that there was a problem with the customization, I forked and changed a bit to make it better.

items.name: Laravel CORS
items.description: I created it for personal projects. This package will add CORS headers to the responses of your Laravel or Lumen app.

items.name: Laravel SQL Logger
items.description: I write it for both current work and personal projects. It helps SQL query logging to make watching and maintain easier.
